org.kepler.provenance

Class RecordPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.provenance.RecordPlayer

  • public class RecordPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to convert provenance formats by reading from a a Queryable and writing to a Recording.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
    See Also:
    Queryable, Recording

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecordPlayer(Queryable queryable)
      Create a new RecordPlayer using a Queryable as the source and no Recording output.
      RecordPlayer(Queryable queryable, Recording recording)
      Create a new RecordPlayer using a Queryable as the source, and Recording for the output.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecordPlayer

        public RecordPlayer(Queryable queryable)
        Create a new RecordPlayer using a Queryable as the source and no Recording output. This is useful if actors within workflow will be re-executed.
        See Also:
        setExecuteGraphicalActors(boolean)

      • RecordPlayer

        public RecordPlayer(Queryable queryable,
                    Recording recording)
        Create a new RecordPlayer using a Queryable as the source, and Recording for the output.
